rooms.description: Two-car garage accommodating two vehicles with ample space for additional storage. Designed with an integrated door to the main house.
Spacious entrance hall leading to a central living area, designed according to Chettinad aesthetics with rich woodwork and intricate detailing.
Open plan living room that flows into the dining area. Ample seating areas and accent lighting for ambiance in accordance with Vastu principles of openness and energy flow.
Elegant dining space adjacent to the living room, designed to accommodate a joint family setting while respecting privacy boundaries.
Modern kitchen with an L-shaped layout ensuring efficient movement. Includes space for modern appliances and a dedicated service area.
ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom, incorporating Vastu-compliant water elements and ventilation design.
